sentences.english: A software company might give bonuses to programmers who create the fewest bugs .
sentences.chinese: 一個軟件公司可以加發獎勵給寫出最少臭蟲的程序員。

sentences.english: The reward for facing fear is that you get to be fully alive.
sentences.chinese: 面對恐懼的獎勵就是你變得完全的鮮活了。

sentences.english: The Commission or training institution may give reward to those who are outstanding in performance.
sentences.chinese: 成績特優者，由本會或訓練機構給予獎勵。

sentences.english: The specific measures for rewarding shall be separately formulated by the CIRC .
sentences.chinese: 具體獎勵辦法由中國保監會另行制定。

sentences.english: Prior to award TJ suppliers' business.
sentences.chinese: 優先獎勵天津供應商的業務量。

sentences.english: You will gain some rewards but the points are not spendable .
sentences.chinese: 你能得到一些獎勵，但是它們本身是不可花費的。

sentences.english: The education and teaching research results of the school won lots of award from district, municipal, provincial and state government.
sentences.chinese: 教育教學研究成果多次榮獲國家及省市區的獎勵。

sentences.english: Because of his writings, professor Yang Qi has won national and ministerial awards several times.
sentences.chinese: 楊起教授著作多次獲國家級與部級獎勵。

sentences.english: Spending a couple of hours on grinding will reward you back with hundreds of wow gold.
sentences.chinese: 磨削將獎勵支出與數百謝文東你回來了幾個小時。

sentences.english: The target paladin loses his Divine Grace bonuses for one round.
sentences.chinese: 目標聖武士將在這一輪內失去他的神恩獎勵。

sentences.english: The company repays hard work with bonuses.
sentences.chinese: 公司對努力工作的員工給予獎勵。

sentences.english: This game has watermelon bowling, two bonus games potatoes mine warfare.
sentences.chinese: 本遊戲有西瓜保齡球，土豆地雷戰兩個獎勵遊戲。

sentences.english: Used to be that sick kids got lollypops after a visit with the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 每次看完醫生後，小孩子就會得到棒棒糖做獎勵。

sentences.english: With our hectic lifestyles, a night of perfect and comfortable sleep seems like the ultimate reward.
sentences.chinese: 完善的夜間睡眠是對忙碌工作的最佳獎勵。

sentences.english: It appears that individual piecework incentives cannot coexist with a truly lean production operation.
sentences.chinese: 個人計件的獎勵不能和一個真正精益生產系統共存。

sentences.english: Are you promotion- or prevention focused in terms of goals?
sentences.chinese: 在達到目標之後，你着重的是獎勵還是預防？

definition: quota/number of places/place (in an institution, a group etc)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
